definition: to hasten/to hurry/to walk fast/to approach/to tend towards/to converge

sentences.english: In addition to these cost and high-base factors, the global cycle has cooled also.
sentences.chinese: 除了這些因素之外，全球週期也已經趨冷。

sentences.english: This time around, some signs of cooling are already apparent.
sentences.chinese: 這段時間，經濟趨冷的標誌已經很明顯了。
